resources.string: Service required to remove your disctraction when you use different applications.
To let Aman Bhaiya remove your distraction, turn on the service for this application
As a student do not waste time in Doing this
nTasks is here, than no waste of time is here
Miui requires an additional permission to work.\nOn the App\'s Information page, please go to \'Other Permissions\' and enable \'Display Pop Up while in background\'
Go to Other Permissions > Display Pop Up while in background
